attributes.action: Supply extensive funding into finding a cure for Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are over 250,000 suffers alone in the UK. CFS takes years of your life away, strikes at any age, is extremely debilitating, renders most sufferers disabled and can lead to an early death. Researchers are very close to finding a cure they just need the funding.

Please help us to live longer and have a better quality of life and provide the funding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
